Happy 8th Birthday Gorilla-Studios

It's been 8 years since the first version of Gorilla-Studios went live! A few tear-downs and re-designs later, many trivial & random posts later and here we are! I meant this post to be a bit more grand but I am laid up this week one appendix lighter so the celebration will have to wait a little bit. I'll be back later with some more, but for now, its time for another nap...

Chris
